extension.description: This service integrates Kodi devices into Indigo Domotics system. It sends events to Indigo about changing menu, player events, volume, etc. Please, visit https://github.com/tenallero/Indigo-XBMC/wiki for documentation.

Este servicio integra dispositivos Kodi con el sistema de Indigo Domotics. Envia eventos a Indigo cuando se cambia de menu, player, volumen, etc. Visite https://github.com/tenallero/Indigo-XBMC/wiki para ver documentacion.
